description: The riega lily (Arthropodium cirrhatum) is an amazing plant that offers a unique and enchanting beauty to any garden. Its fragrant white and lilac flowers stand proudly atop tall, slender stalks, giving the landscape a shimmery, ethereal quality. This hardy perennial is able to thrive in full sun or partial shade, making it the perfect choice for gardens in many climates. The foliage has an attractive clumping habit, and its long-lasting blooms can last for weeks. With its impressive beauty, low maintenance requirements, and drought-tolerant nature, this lovely plant is an ideal choice for any landscaping project.
